TopicTitle: My seat is installed upside down!

Articles.Content:
I actually managed to land on Duna a little bit ago in the one-man pod, and I noticed something while I was looking out the window.... My seat is installed upside down!

I'm just wondering if this is intentional, because that would kinda mess up the window view from rovers later on, since the majority of them use that pod.

Also this thing is impossible to stand on it's head. At least on a hill.
Your kerbal's back is against the bottom of the pod and he is looking straight up through the window.

Ah, okay. I just went in-game and confirmed that. A little disorienting. My mind wants me to believe that Jeb's butt is facing the ground, but indeed the window is slightly behind him.
